name: Arcade Boat Duel
description:
Dynamic arcade boat racing.

It's a demo version (prototype) with 1 track

Modes:

Career - in development.

Quick Race - race with bot.

Split Screen - race with your friend on one device.

Controls:

Player 1: UP - nitro on start race, DOWN - speed break, LEFT, RIGHT

Player 2: W - nitro on start race, S - speed break, A, D

You can use a Gamepad.
